short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: NI Monitoring extension for Chrome browsers - by @simon.ifergan ; https://github.com/simonifergan

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: NI Monitoring is an extension that scans any NI-related websites and add Monitoring=1 to the query params in order to reduce in-office logs.
